original_text: I will roar loudly like a lion, so that my children come to follow me. When I roar, my children will shake with fear, as they come from the west. I will roar loudly like a lion, so that my children come to follow me. When I roar, my children will shake with fear, as they come from the west. I will roar loudly like a lion,
korean_text: 그들은 사자처럼 소리를 내시는 여호와를 따를 것이라 여호와께서 소리를 내시면 자손들이 서쪽에서부터 떨며 오되

sentences.original_text: I will roar loudly like a lion
so that my children come to follow me
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 자녀들이 나를 따라오게 하기 위해

as they come from the west
